document.full_text: a russian soyuz spacecraft, carrying two cosmonauts and a u.s. astronaut to the international space station, blasted off early on tuesday from russia's launchpad in kazakhstan, blazing a fiery trail across the night sky.
document.title: u.s.-russian crew blast off for space station
lines_and_colors: a russian soyuz spacecraft, carrying two cosmonauts and a u.s. astronaut to the international space station, blasted off early on tuesday from russia's launchpad in kazakhstan, blazing a fiery trail across the night sky.
